channel.title: Zombie apocalypse
channel.description:
When the zombie apocalypse comes who will survive
Rednecks or the city people?
this topic is not to offend anyone if you get offended from this why df did you read and/or click on it and if you are offended dont comment

item.title: Zombie apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:17, topic:547367”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=666273.msg4455161#msg4455161 date=1414286369]

Not offended, but you’re a moron if you think country side people are all “red necks”. Living in Florida, there is a major difference between the confederate flag wearing dumb asses, and good old country folk.

Country-side will always be more safe that city. What’s better, having to fight all 50 undead neighbors, or fighting potentially the 3 that live acres away from you and probably will never find you? Not to mention country side is more likely to have crops and land to grow one’s own produce to survive, forests to hunt for game. Depending on the country person’s interests, they are more than likely going to have a shotgun, hunting rifle(s), and potentially a bow. Odds are they will have more ammo stocked than a city person, and not have to worry about fighting other human beings over firepower, which will probably result in getting shot yourself. Without a doubt, country side people will outlast city people.

Overall guns are highly ineffective against zombies anyways. Most of them are heavy, require some level of skill, and are garbage in a close range situation. Think of all the sharp objects most country people have to use to make a living on farms and such. Broken bottles and switch blades aren’t going to save you in a zombie apocalypse.

are you stupid :palm: just go go away dumbass

No, I am not stupid. Nothing in my statement would indicate that, so I am not sure why you would ask such a stupid question. Don’t be a hater because your question sucks
[/quote]Elrick has a great point here. Nothing “dumbass” at all actually, his reasoning is rather thoroughly explained and his arguments are all backed up.[/quote]

Didnt really read it just the beginning Sorry elrick

Read full topic

Odds are they will have more ammo stocked than a city person, and not have to worry about fighting other human beings over firepower, which will probably result in getting shot yourself. Think of all the sharp objects most country people have to use to make a living on farms and such. Broken bottles and switch blades aren’t going to save you in a zombie apocalypse.

are you stupid :palm: just go go away dumbass
[/quote]
No, I am not stupid. Nothing in my statement would indicate that, so I am not sure why you would ask such a stupid question. Don’t be a hater because your question sucks ;)[/quote]Elrick has a great point here. Nothing “dumbass” at all actually, his reasoning is rather thoroughly explained and his arguments are all backed up.

item.title: Zombie apocalypse
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

nolan2131:

Zombie apocalypse isn’t ever coming, but from a fictitious point of view I’d say smart athletic people in general. Your topic makes it seem as if the world is split between “city people” and “rednecks.”

I know, it isn’t im talking about city people and rednecks, theres allot of smart athletic people but all my friends think the rednecks will out live the city people, so i decided to make a topic and “Rednecks” and “City People”

So i made a topic here for all of you to decide who will live longer, not that it matters tho

Zombie apocalypse isn’t ever coming
but its just something for fun

Read full topic
